page.title: 15MY SCHOOLDAY MORNING
page.content: I get up at about five and twenty to eight and put my dressing gown and slippers on and go down to have my breakfast.I usually have Weetabix and toast.When I finish my breakfast, I go upstairs to get washed.In the bathroom,I usually have an argument with my sister over the toothpaste. After that I go into my bedroom to get dressed.I have my radio on. After getting dressed,I go down to polish my shoes.Then I go into the study to do my guitar practice.After that I go to school in my dads Ford Granada 2.8i car. When I get into the school playground, I hang around with Nigel, Michael, Craig, and Darren. About fifteen minutes after that the whistle goes for us to go in.When we get into school, we do lessons like Maths, English, Project, Art and Storywork.
